remarks: Elimination of a restricted existential quantifier, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2005.)
statement:
ceqsrex2v.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsrex2v.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ceqsrex2v $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( E. x e. C E. y e. D ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) /\ ph ) <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x $.
$d D x y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
